name: Spidren
description:
Eat your children before they rip off all your legs to gouge out your eyes.

Give birth to more children.

REPEAT

HOLD FEMUR + TIBIA & TAP METATARUS TO STAB

HOLD TIBIA + METATARSUS TO FEED

  • D + C

RAISE FEMUR

  • W E R T
  • Y U I O

LOWER TIBIA

  • A S D F
  • J K L ;

CURL/STAB METATARSUS
